sentence.Network_en: I'll have coffee and a brioche.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要一杯咖啡和一份奶油面包卷。

sentence.Network_en: One can also shape the brioche into a braid for special occasions.
sentence.Network_cn: 你同样可以在特殊场合下将奶油蛋卷做成麻花状.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 布里欧(Brioche)是种源自法国的传统面包，配上一杯Expresso或是Cappuccino就是义大利常见的早餐，也代表着艺术家1996~2002年 …
配以松酥香甜的法式牛油面包（brioche），鹅肝的味道更佳。厨师们也偏爱以无花果、葡萄干以及各式酸甜口味的果酱搭配鹅肝菜式…
将制作台湾“芋头酥”的概念与法式“奶油蛋卷”(Brioche)融合，进而做出“烟熏桂圆面包”，是六福皇宫点心房副主厨文世成的创意。而这 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: French, from Norman French brier, synonym of broyer, literally 'split up into very small pieces by pressure'

entry.def: Brioche is a kind of sweet bread.

means.word_mean: 1. a light roll rich with eggs and butter and somewhat sweet
